name: Ocean Islands
description:
FULLSCREEN IS REQUIRED

If you're stuck at any point try dragging every object on the screen around, and when I say any I mean any

The reason for my early submission is that me and my family is going on vacation the 25th, but I hope you like the game even though its pretty short.

Controls

WASD to move around

Space bar to drag objects around

Credits

Rin. for the music

freesounds.org for sound effects
